text: The iPhone 11 is a smartphone sold by Apple Inc. It replaced the iPhone X that was released in 2018. The iPhone 11 has two rear camera lenses but still has a 6.1-inch screen, like the X. It is available in purple, white, yellow, green, black, and PRODUCT(RED) finishes, with 64 GB, 128 GB, and 256 GB storage options. The starting price is US $699. It is the least expensive 2019 iPhone model, when compared to the iPhone 11 Pro and iPhone 11 Pro Max. == Notes == == References == 11 Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2019 Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras Category:Mobile phones with 4K video recording
title: IPhone 11
